name: A Potato with a Gun
description:
This game was made in 7 days as a part of Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

A Potato with a Gun is a game about a Potato with a Gun. In this game, you are a potato, and you have a gun. The aim of the game is to be a potato with a gun and reach the end of the game by being a potato and using the gun. You are a potato with a gun.

 

Controls:

A and D to move

Space to jump

Mouse to aim and shoot

R to return to last checkpoint because webgl build is buggy and i dont know how to fix it

Links and Resources used:

Pixel Platformer Blocks by Kenney

Kenney Fonts by Kenney

Keyboard Button Icons by Nicolae (Xelu) Berbece

Ultimate 2D Platformer Controller by Tarodev

Brick from Wikipedia
